TopicTitle: Multiple part writing in the next parttools please.

Articles.Content:
There's a flag for it (or so it seems) but after asking a few times in the dev section no one seems to know how to make it work.

I know from experience that when writing a set of related parts (especially when they all use the same material) it's simpler to just keep them all in one scene, so it would be nice to write them all at once, possibly taking into account a common material, the textures for which only needs to be written once.

Edited December 30, 2014 by Cpt. Kipard
